name: Retrieve the Sales Opportunity Information for a Customer

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000246000"

When I Retrieve the Sales Opportunity Information
| cifKey |
| 0100000930000246000 |

Then the following Sales Opportunity Information should be returned
| element | productType | activityCode | opportunityScore | opportunityDescriptionCode | healthScore | healthDescriptionCode | healthDescription | value |
| currentAccountInfo | Current Account | 4 | 8 | 250 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| depositAccountInfo | Deposits | 2 | 16 | 221 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| creditCardsInfo | Credit Card | 4 | 38 | 151 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| loanAccountInfo | Loan | 0 | 42 | 121 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| mortgageAccountInfo | Mortgage | 0 | 46 | 111 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| insuranceInfo | Insurance | 0 | 32 | 161 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| investmentInfo | Investment | 2 | 26 | 201 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| pensionInfo | Pension | 0 | 20 | 211 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| otherAccountInfo | Other | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 |  |  |
| complandErrInd |  |  |  |  |  |  |  | CNEN |
| potlMergeInd |  |  |  |  |  |  |  | N |
| custMarpInd |  |  |  |  |  |  |  | N |
| treatmentFlag |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| treatmentStrategy |  |  |  |  |  |  |  | Personal Classic |
